articles.title: How to Stay Motivated Working Out Alone at Home: 7 Systems That Kept Me Going for 2 Years
articles.author: Alex Rodriguez
articles.description: No gym = no trainer or workout buddies = easy to quit. After failing 6 times to stick with home workouts, here are the 7 motivation systems that finally made it stick for 2+ years.
